definition: to remove makeup/(old) to take off formal dress and ornaments
to unload/to unhitch/to remove or strip/to get rid of
(of a woman) to adorn oneself/makeup/adornment/trousseau/stage makeup and costume

sentences.chinese: 你发现原来还有卸妆水这种东东。

sentences.english: Removes gently with Revlon ColorStay Eye& Lip Makeup Remover .
sentences.chinese: 卸妆时请配合使用露华浓不脱色眼唇部卸妆乳。

sentences.english: Removes gently with Revlon ColorStay Eye& Lip Makeup Remover .
sentences.chinese: 卸妆时请配合使用露华浓不脱色眼唇部卸妆乳。

sentences.english: Who had makeup on in the face to be sure to thoroughly clean cream remover.
sentences.chinese: 上过妆的人，在洗脸前一定要先用清洁霜来彻底卸妆。

sentences.english: A thick-whipped elegant moisturizing cream for cleansing and facial make-up removal.
sentences.chinese: 用于洁面和脸部卸妆的一种浓厚的保湿霜状产品。

sentences.english: It can be used for cleaning skin after removing makeup.
sentences.chinese: 可作为卸妆后第二重清洁。

sentences.english: Neutrogena Makeup Remover Cleansing Towelettes, Refill Pack, 25 Count.
sentences.chinese: 露得清卸妆洁面纸巾，补充包，25计数。

sentences.english: The pouch after discharge makeup is serious Hei Qing, how repair?
sentences.chinese: 卸妆后眼袋严重黑青，怎么修复？

sentences.english: You need to take off your make-up with lotion and eye make-up remover.
sentences.chinese: 你需要用卸妆药水和眼部清洗油去除你的彩妆。

sentences.english: Must be removed with an appropriate makeup solvent.
sentences.chinese: 必须使用卸妆物品卸除。

sentences.english: Why not buy some makeup remover?
So, cleansing oils are good after all! ( so, I have to get over my oil phobia!
This cold cream takes off all my make-up.
A gentle alcohol - free make-up remover that tones skin in one step.
sentences.chinese: 不含酒精的温和卸妆水，一次过完成洁净及爽肤程序。

sentences.english: As an eyeliner this has staying power, yet comes off easily.
sentences.chinese: 作为眼线笔用，色彩保持精彩，而卸妆非常容易。

sentences.english: Not just your make-up. But also the way you enter your bath.
sentences.chinese: 岂知是卸妆，嫂嫂沐浴的顺序我都知道。
